bankidhandler.bankIdUserMessage_ShortName_RFA13: Trying to start the BankID app.
bankidhandler.bankIdUserMessage_ShortName_RFA14A: Searching for BankID, it may take a while… If a few seconds have passed and no BankID has been found, you probably do not have a BankID that can be used for the current identification / signature in this computer. If you have a BankID card, insert it into the card reader. If you do not have a BankID, you can pick one up at your internet bank. If you have a BankID on another device, you can start your BankID app there.
bankidhandler.bankIdUserMessage_ShortName_RFA1QR: Launch the BankID app and scan the QR code.
bankidhandler.bankIdUserMessage_ShortName_RFA15A: Searching for BankID, it may take a while… If a few seconds have passed and no BankID has been found, you probably do not have a BankID that can be used for the current identification / signature in this computer. If you have a BankID card, insert it into the card reader. If you do not have a BankID, you can pick one up at your internet bank.
bankidhandler.bankIdUserMessage_ShortName_RFA4: An identification or signature for this personal identity-number has already begun. Try again.
bankidhandler.bankIdUserMessage_ShortName_RFA9: Enter your security code in the BankID app and select Identify or Sign.
